org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

pat_request_ids.description: Unique identifiers of the requests for access via fine-grained personal access token. Must be formed of between 1 and 100 `pat_request_id` values.

action.description: Action to apply to the requests.

reason.description: Reason for approving or denying the requests. Max 1024 characters.
